original_text: After David had destroyed Hadadezer's army, Rezon became the leader of a group of bad men. Rezon went to Damascus with his men, and Rezon became ruler of the city.
korean_text: 다윗이 소바 사람을 죽일 때에 르손이 사람들을 자기에게 모으고 그 무리의 괴수가 되어 다메섹으로 가서 살다가 거기서 왕이 되었더라

sentences.original_text: After David had destroyed Hadadezer's army
Rezon became the leader of a group of bad men
Rezon went to Damascus with his men
sentences.korean_translation: 레손이 그의 사람들을 데리고 다메섹으로 갔으며

sentences.original_text: Rezon became ruler of the city
